distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for djvulibre fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-46310: Fixed divide by zero in IW44Image.cpp (bsc#1214670).
- CVE-2021-46312: Fixed divide by zero in IW44EncodeCodec.cpp (bsc#1214672).
- CVE-2021-32490: Fixed out of bounds write in function DJVU:filter_bv() via crafted djvu file (bsc#1185895).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A flaw was found in djvulibre-3.5.28 and earlier. An out of bounds write in function DJVU::filter_bv() via crafted djvu file may lead to application crash and other consequences.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
